Omegasis.HappyBirthday_BelatedBirthdayWi: Happy belated birthday, @! ^ Hopefully this year we can go on even more adventures together. ^^ - Abigail {0}
Yo @, happy belated birthday! ^ Here's to making this the best year yet. ^^ - Alex {0}
Happy belated birthday, @. ^ Thank you for all that you've done for our community. I'm sure your parents must be proud of you. ^^ - Caroline {0}
Hey, happy belated birthday, @. ^ I'm sure this year is going to be great for you. ^^ - Clint {0}
Happy belated birthday, @! ^ Make sure you take some time off today to enjoy yourself. ^^ - Demetrius {0}
Happy belated birthday, @. ^ Wait, humans celebrate those, right? ^^ - Dwarf {0}
I hope you had a lovely day on your birthday, @. ^ I was trying to write you a poem for the occasion, but a 'happy belated birthday' will have to suffice for now. ^^ - Elliott {0}
Happy belated birthday, @! ^ I can see your future shining bright. ^^ - Emily {0}
Happy belated birthday, @. ^ You have grown into such a fine individual, and I'm sure your grandfather would be proud to see who you've become. ^^ - Evelyn {0}
When you get to my age, birthdays start to come and go. Still, happy belated birthday, @. ^^ - George {0}
Hey, @, happy belated birthday! ^ Hopefully you enjoy the rest of the day, and make sure you aren't a stranger at the saloon! ^^ - Gus {0}
Happy belated birthday, @. ^ Hopefully this year you'll get some good presents! ^^ - Haley {0}
Happy belated birthday, @. ^ Come in for a checkup sometime, alright? I want to make sure you'll see plenty more. ^^ - Harvey {0}
Happy belated birthday, @. ^ I'm glad I decided to get to know you. ^^ - Jas {0}
Hello there, @. ^ Rumor has it that yesterday was your birthday. In that case, happy belated birthday! ^^ - Jodi {0}
Jodi told me that it was your birthday yesterday, @. ^ Happy belated birthday, and make sure to cherish every single day. ^^ - Kent {0}
Happy belated birthday, @. ^ I still don't quite understand humans, but I'm glad to have met you all the same. ^^ - Krobus {0}
Hey @, happy belated birthday! ^ I'm glad to see you're doing well on the farm and I hope this next year gives you new inspiration! ^^ - Leah {0}
Hi @, ^ my bird family told me that your birthday was yesterday so I wanted to wish you a happy belated birthday. I hope you have another great year! ^^ -Leo {0}
Happy belated birthday, @! ^ I really appreciate everything you've done for the town. Keep up the good work. ^^ - Lewis {0}
Happy belated birthday, @. ^ Thanks for visiting me from time to time, It makes me really happy to have such wonderful company. ^^ - Linus {0}
Hi, @! ^ Everyone was talking about your birthday yesterday, and I wanted to make sure that I wished you a happy birthday as well. So, happy belated birthday! ^^ - Marnie {0}
Happy belated birthday, @. ^ I tried to make an everlasting candle for you, but sadly that didn't work out. Maybe next year, right? ^^ - Maru {0}
Happy belated birthday, kid. ^ We should have a drink sometime to celebrate another year of life for you! ^^ - Pam {0}
Happy belated birthday, @. ^ May you enjoy all of life's blessings this year. ^^ - Penny {0}
Hey @, happy belated birthday! ^ Hopefully this next year will be a great one for you! ^^ - Pierre {0}
Hey, @, happy belated birthday! ^ I'm really glad you decided to move to the valley. ^^ - Robin {0}
Hey @, happy belated birthday! ^ We'll have to have a birthday jam session for you sometime! ^^ - Sam {0}
Hey, sweetie, ^ I wish I could have made it to town to wish you a happy birthday, but I still wanted to wish you a happy belated birthday all the same~. Here's to many more. ^^ - Sandy {0}
Happy belated birthday, @. ^ Hope things are going well down at the farm. ^^ - Sebastian {0}
Happy belated birthday, @. ^ Keep working hard, and I'm sure this next year will be a great one for you. ^^ - Shane {0}
Hey @, ^ mom told me yesterday was your birthday so I wanted to wish you a happy belated birthday! Come by so we can play sometime! ^^ - Vincent {0}
Ahoy, @, ^ happy belated birthday. Looking at you reminds me of the days when I was just a guppy myself. Enjoy yours while you can, young'un. ^^ - Willy {0}

Happy belated birthday ^ @. Never forget that you alone make your future. How did I know? Ah, I overheard a few of the locals conferring on what gifts to give you. I think you'll appreciate them. ^^ - M. Rasmodius {0}
Omegasis.HappyBirthday_Dad: Dear @,^  Happy birthday kiddo. It's been a little quiet around here on your birthday since you aren't around, but your mother and I know that you are making both your grandpa and us proud.  We both know that living on your own can be tough but we believe in you one hundred percent, just keep following your dreams.^  Love, Dad ^ P.S. Here's some spending money to help you out on the farm. Good luck! {0}

Hey @. ^ I thought it would be fun if we had a small party for you today. Could you come by the mines later?^ Sincerly,^      -Abigail
